document.full_text: a group of western powers and middle eastern states called for the first time on wednesday for muammar gaddafi to step aside, but nato countries squabbled publicly over stepping up air strikes to help topple him.
document.title: western, arab nations say gaddafi must go
lines_and_colors: a group of western powers and middle eastern states called for the first time on wednesday for muammar gaddafi to step aside, but nato countries squabbled publicly over stepping up air strikes to help topple him.
